text: Grace Poe (born September 3, 1968) is the adopted daughter of Filipino actors Susan Roces and Fernando Poe, Jr. She served as chairperson of the Movie and Television Review and Classification Board (MTRCB) from 2010 to 2012 and in the Philippine Senate since 2013. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Adoptees Category:Politicians from Iloilo
title: Grace Poe
